structure.unit: B LICENSURE AND REGULATION OF HEALTH FACILITIES AND SERVICES

law.catch_line: School-located health care or dental care programs provided by not-for-profit primary care centers at public school or Head Start program.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 40, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 127, sec. 1, effective June 24, 2003.
